actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a deduction for legal expenses of individuals who bring sexual harassment suits against their employers.
short_title: Sexual Harassment Tax Equity Act of 1996
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Sexual Harassment Tax Equity Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for legal expenses of an individual who brings a sexual harassment suit against an employer or former employer. Allows the deduction whether or not the taxpayer itemizes.

titles.title: Sexual Harassment Tax Equity Act of 1996
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a deduction for legal expenses of individuals who bring sexual harassment suits against their employers.
